messages: ElizaOS sees a surge of new plugin integrations for cryptocurrency and blockchain enhancements.
Notable additions include the Arbitrage Plugin for automated cryptocurrency trading across DEXs using Flashbots for privacy.
New Mind Network and Moralis plugins promise enhanced data access and cryptocurrency analysis.
Introduction of the Quick Intel Plugin for token security analysis further solidifies ElizaOS as a robust trading assistant.
The BitTensoriPlugin upgrade adds native Twitter image detection for better memory management and analysis report generation.
Resolved Twitter-related bugs to improve API interactions, including the HomeTimeline name parse issue.
Format-related issues in ComposeState were fixed, clarifying message handling and layout.
Turbo cache enabled, greatly improving build efficiency and project deployment.
One-click deployments set up on various platforms including Render.com, Railway, and DigitalOcean, simplifying application deployment.
Bitcoin continues to show strong growth, with a noticeable 10.93% increase, bringing its current price to $104,692.
Ethereum experiences a significant surge, escalating by 32.91% to reach a new trading price of $3,330.07 per coin.
Solana's current price is $256.16, witnessing a moderate daily increase of 4.22% as part of a broader market trend.
